io.cucumber.needle

Class NeedleFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.akquinet.jbosscc.needle.NeedleTestcase
      • io.cucumber.needle.NeedleFactory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ObjectFactory

    @API(status=STABLE)
public final class NeedleFactory
extends de.akquinet.jbosscc.needle.NeedleTestcase
implements ObjectFactory
    Needle factory for object resolution inside of cucumber tests.

        public <T> T getInstance(Class<T> type)
        Description copied from interface: ObjectFactory
        Provides the glue instances used to execute the current scenario. The instance can be prepared in ObjectFactory.start().

      • addClass

        public boolean addClass(Class<?> type)
        Description copied from interface: ObjectFactory
        Collects glue classes in the classpath. Called once on init.
        Specified by:
        addClass in interface ObjectFactory
        Parameters:
        type - Glue class containing cucumber.api annotations (Before, Given, When, ...)
        Returns:
        true if stepdefs and hooks in this class should be used, false if they should be ignored.
